tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I must commend Dr. Bharti Ramesh for her unwavering commitment and exceptional skill during my family's time at the hospital. Her reassuring presence instilled confidence, ensuring my wife and children were in safe hands.
Thanks you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ******* ****** ** *** ** *** ****** ************* ** *** ** *** ******* ** ******** ******* *** I am fortunate to be one of her patients. 
I visited Dr Bharthi Ramesh when I was in my 8 month pregnancy, but initially was very skeptical on how she would handle my twin pregnancy as we choose Dr Bharthi Ramesh based on the reviews and recommendations on Practo.
But hands down, I am happy to say we made the right choice.
She is very calm and composed and handled my high risk twin pregnancy with such ease.
From day one of my consultation I immediately was very comfortable and confident of not going to have premature pregnancy. 
With her insights and direction I was able to successfully complete 37 weeks and delivered healthy twins.  And the silver lining was that not having to keep my twins in ICU.
She never treated my case as a high risk pregnancy, I cannot imagine a more supportive, brilliant OBG.
Thank you Dr Bharthi Ramesh for all the support.

Without any second thought I would recommend Dr Bharthi Ramesh to anyone who is looking for hassle free pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.@Bharathi Ramesh is very experienced *** **** **************  I am very impressed with the doctors way of dealing the cases. She understands and listens every bit of patients problem and gives proper solution in a friendly manner. I would recommend everyone to consult the doctor for any gynec/pregnancy and delivery treatments for the people staying in Bangalore south.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had a good Experience at sri sharadha clinic and my special thanks to Dr.Bharathi ramesh madam she is one of the best gynecologist in Bangalore....
She supported and guided us from day 1..i delivered a baby boy via normal delivery though my baby had umbilical cord arround the neck at Kangaroo care vijaynagar and she answered all my queries throughout the journey

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I was visiting Bharati Ramesh over the course of my pregnancy and had a fairly decent experience till about the end. When I had to undergo internal PV tests at 37 and 39 weeks , I was in a lot of pain. This doctor instead of showing some empathy, was harsh and mean and literally told me 'only God could help me' and blamed me for being non cooperative. I just had a week due for delivery and I walked out in tears post the session with her. I would really ask everyone to think twice before consulting with her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Bharathi is amazing. She handled my high risk twin pregnancy with such ease. Also kept me calm during my entire pregnancy. She gives out only required information and does not bombard you with unnecessary advice. I just blindly trusted her and religiously followed everything she said. She delivered my two beautiful boys thank you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is one of the wonderful doctors I have ever met; she treated me with utmost care and is very friendly and answered all my queries during my pregnancy, I also had my C section with her and had a healthy baby girl. Would recommend her to each and every expecting ladies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Bharathi madam is such a wonderful woman, very friendly. Encouraged me throughout pregnancy. Though my baby had umbilical cord around neck, she supported me to try for vaginal delivery. Yes, I delivered a baby boy via normal delivery. Thanks a ton for this madam. 
So happy to get delivered from you madam.
